entry.title: Monday: Snow and blowing snow. High minus 14.
entry.summary: Snow and blowing snow ending this afternoon then a mix of sun and cloud. Amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind north 40 km/h gusting to 60 diminishing to 20 this afternoon. High minus 14. Wind chill minus 31 this morning and minus 23 this afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM CST Monday 20 February 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 27.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Wind northwest 20 km/h becoming light overnight. Low minus 27. Wind chill minus 24 this evening and minus 36 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 11:00 AM CST Monday 20 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Chance of light snow. High minus 17. POP 30%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. 30 percent chance of light snow in the afternoon. Wind becoming northeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 near noon. High minus 17. Wind chill minus 36 in the morning and minus 27 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM CST Monday 20 February 2023
